SEARCH
Package hms.inventory

Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
hms.inventory.Inventory
public class Inventory extends Object
Manages the inventory of medications in a healthcare setting. This includes tracking stock levels, adding new medications, updating existing stocks, and handling stock replenishments.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Inventory()
    Constructs an empty Inventory.

  • Constructor Details

    • Inventory

      public Inventory()
      Constructs an empty Inventory.

  • Method Details

    • addMedication

      public void addMedication(Medication medication)
      Adds a new medication to the inventory. This method updates the medication list in the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      medication - The medication to add, which includes its name, stock, and alert level.

    • replenishStock

      public void replenishStock(String name, int amount)
      Replenishes the stock for a specified medication by the given amount.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the medication to replenish.
      amount - The amount to add to the current stock.

    • consumeStock

      public boolean consumeStock(String medicationName, int amountToConsume)
      Consumes a specified amount of stock for a given medication.
      Parameters:
      medicationName - The name of the medication.
      amountToConsume - The amount of stock to be consumed.
      Returns:
      true if the stock was successfully consumed, false if the stock level was insufficient.

    • viewInventory

      public void viewInventory(int index)
      Prints the current inventory to the standard output, listing all medications and their stock levels.

    • checkStockLevels

      public List<String> checkStockLevels()
      Checks which medications need to be restocked based on their current levels and alert thresholds.
      Returns:
      A list of medication names that need restocking.

    • setAlertLine

      public void setAlertLine(Medication medication, int alertLineAmount)
      Sets a new alert line for a specific medication in the inventory.
      Parameters:
      medication - The medication object whose alert line is to be updated.
      alertLineAmount - The new alert level to set for the medication.

    • retrieveMedications

      public List<Medication> retrieveMedications()
      Retrieves a list of all medications currently in the inventory along with their stock levels and alert levels.
      Returns:
      A list of all medications in the inventory.

    • removeMedication

      public void removeMedication(Medication medicationToRemove)
      Removes a specified medication from the inventory.
      Parameters:
      medicationToRemove - The medication object to be removed from the inventory.

    • updateStockLevel

      public void updateStockLevel(String name, int amountToUpdateTo)
      Updates the stock level for a specified medication in the inventory.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the medication whose stock level is to be updated.
      amountToUpdateTo - The new stock amount to set for the medication.

    • replenishRequest

      public void replenishRequest(Medication name, int amountToReplenish)
      Submits a replenishment request for a specific medication, adding the request amount to the pending replenish queue.
      Parameters:
      name - The medication for which the replenish request is made.
      amountToReplenish - The amount of stock requested to replenish.

    • viewReplenishRequestOptions

      public void viewReplenishRequestOptions(List<String> replenishRequest)
      Displays options for replenish requests.
      Parameters:
      replenishRequest - A list of strings representing replenish requests to display.

    • viewReplenishRequests

      public List<Medication> viewReplenishRequests()
      Retrieves a list of medications that have pending replenish requests along with the requested amounts.
      Returns:
      A list of medications needing replenishment.

    • approveReplenishRequest

      public void approveReplenishRequest(String medicationToReplenish)
      Approves a replenish request for a specific medication, updating the inventory with the requested stock amount.
      Parameters:
      medicationToReplenish - The name of the medication to replenish.
